
number(?Number)

   Succeeds if Number is a number.



Arguments
   ?Number             Prolog term.

Type
   Type Testing

Description
   Used to test whether Number is a number.  number/1 could be defined as



   number(X) :- integer(X).
   number(X) :- rational(X).
   number(X) :- float(X).
   number(X) :- breal(X).



Resatisfiable
      No.

Fail Conditions
      Fails if Number is not a number.



Examples
   
   Success:
   number(10).
   number(-21.0).
   number(1_3).
   number(3e27).
   Fail:
   number(pi).
   number(e).
   number('-21.0').
   number(X).
   number(fred).





See Also
   atomic / 1, integer / 1, breal / 1, rational / 1, float / 1, real / 1
